title: SSO Authentication System
description: Centralized single sign-on system supporting multiple authentication providers and enterprise-grade security.
summary: Centralized single sign-on system supporting multiple authentication providers and enterprise-grade security.

challenges.solution: Built OAuth2/OIDC adapters for Google, Microsoft, and custom LDAP providers with unified API.
Implemented Redis-based session storage with distributed token validation for scalability.
Added MFA support, rate limiting, IP whitelisting, and comprehensive audit logging.
Designed seamless token rotation with sliding expiration to balance security and UX.

outcome: The SSO system has unified authentication across 15+ enterprise applications, eliminating password fatigue and reducing support tickets related to login issues by 80%.
